ITEM.TITLE: Clarity
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Restores mana on the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

ITEM.TITLE: Tango
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore health over time. Comes with 4 charges.Use on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

ITEM.TITLE: Healing Salve
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP on the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

ITEM.TITLE: Smoke of Deceit
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.

ITEM.TITLE: Town Portal Scroll
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

ITEM.TITLE: Dust of Appearance
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

ITEM.TITLE: Animal Courier
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.
ITEM.ROLE: Creature that carries items to and from your base.

ITEM.TITLE: Flying Courier
ITEM.ROLE: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base. Requires Animal Courier.

ITEM.TITLE: Observer Ward
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 7 minutes.Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

ITEM.TITLE: Sentry Ward
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 4 minutes.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

ITEM.TITLE: Bottle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
ITEM.ROLE: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated. If Bottle is empty, it causes a courier to move 30% slower.Hold Control to use your Bottle on an allied hero.

ITEM.TITLE: Iron Branch
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

ITEM.TITLE: Gauntlets of Strength
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

ITEM.TITLE: Slippers of Agility
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

ITEM.TITLE: Mantle of Intelligence
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

ITEM.TITLE: Circlet
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

ITEM.TITLE: Belt of Strength
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

ITEM.TITLE: Band of Elvenskin
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

ITEM.TITLE: Robe of the Magi
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

ITEM.TITLE: Ogre Club
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You grow stronger just by holding it.

ITEM.TITLE: Blade of Alacrity
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A long blade imbued with time magic.

ITEM.TITLE: Staff of Wizardry
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

ITEM.TITLE: Ultimate Orb
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

ITEM.TITLE: Ring of Protection
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

ITEM.TITLE: Quelling Blade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Destroy Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree, or deals 100 damage to a ward.Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

ITEM.TITLE: Stout Shield
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

ITEM.TITLE: Blades of Attack
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

ITEM.TITLE: ChainMail
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A medium weave of metal chains.

ITEM.TITLE: Helm of Iron Will
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

ITEM.TITLE: BroadSword
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

ITEM.TITLE: QuarterStaff
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

ITEM.TITLE: ClayMore
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

ITEM.TITLE: Javelin
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.

ITEM.TITLE: PlateMail
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

ITEM.TITLE: Mithril Hammer
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

ITEM.TITLE: Magic Stick
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

ITEM.TITLE: Sage's Mask
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

ITEM.TITLE: Ring of Regen
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

ITEM.TITLE: Boots of Speed
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
ITEM.ROLE: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Gloves of Haste
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

ITEM.TITLE: Cloak
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

ITEM.TITLE: Gem of True Sight
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death, but cannot be destroyed.

ITEM.TITLE: Morbid Mask
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

ITEM.TITLE: Ghost Scepter
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form and become unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form.

ITEM.TITLE: Talisman of Evasion
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
ITEM.ROLE: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

ITEM.TITLE: Blink Dagger
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Shadow Amulet
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or target allied hero over 1.5 seconds. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

ITEM.TITLE: Wraith Band
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

ITEM.TITLE: Null Talisman
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

ITEM.TITLE: Magic Wand
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

ITEM.TITLE: Bracer
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

ITEM.TITLE: Poor Man's Shield
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.
ITEM.RECIPE: Slippers of Agility,Slippers of Agility,Stout Shield

ITEM.TITLE: Soul Ring
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Phase Boots
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
ITEM.RECIPE: Boots of Speed,Blades of Attack,Blades of Attack

ITEM.TITLE: Power Treads
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
ITEM.RECIPE: Gloves of Haste,Boots of Speed,Belt of Strength

ITEM.TITLE: Oblivion Staff
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

ITEM.TITLE: Perseverance
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

ITEM.TITLE: Hand of Midas
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

ITEM.TITLE: Boots of Travel
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Ring of Basilius
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: HeadDress
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a 750 unit radius.,Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Buckler
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

ITEM.TITLE: Urn of Shadows
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
ITEM.ROLE: Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
ITEM.EXTRA: RELEASE ALLY TOTAL HEAL: 400,RELEASE ENEMY TOTAL DAMAGE: 150,SOUL RELEASE DURATION: 8
ITEM.RECIPE: Recipe,Sage's Mask,Gauntlets of Strength,Gauntlets of Strength

ITEM.TITLE: Ring of Aquila
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.,Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.,Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Tranquil Boots
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or get attacked you lose the HP regeneration and 30 Movement Speed for 13 seconds.
ITEM.RECIPE: Boots of Speed,Ring of Protection,Ring of Regen

ITEM.TITLE: Medallion of Courage
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The bearer has no fear of combat.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Valor - Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Arcane Boots
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero.Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Drum of Endurance
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +10 attack speed and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Vladmir's Offering
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
ITEM.EXTRA: AURA LIFESTEAL: 16%,AURA BONUS DAMAGE: 15%,AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5,AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8
ITEM.RECIPE: Recipe,Ring of Regen,Ring of Basilius,Morbid Mask

ITEM.TITLE: Mekansm
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Pipe of Insight
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.Passive: Insight Aura - Gives nearby friendly units 4 health regeneration.

ITEM.TITLE: Force Staff
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to self-cast.

ITEM.TITLE: Necronomicon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 40 seconds. Upgradable.

ITEM.TITLE: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Cyclone - A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

ITEM.TITLE: Dagon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

ITEM.TITLE: Veil of Discord
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The headwear of corrupt magi.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 25.0 seconds.
ITEM.EXTRA: MAGIC WEAKNESS RADIUS: 600,MAGIC WEAKNESS DURATION: 25,INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 25%

ITEM.TITLE: Rod of Atos
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
ITEM.RECIPE: Staff of Wizardry,Staff of Wizardry,Vitality Booster

ITEM.TITLE: Aghanim's Scepter
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
ITEM.RECIPE: Point Booster,Staff of Wizardry,Ogre Club,Blade of Alacrity

ITEM.TITLE: Orchid Malevolence
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.

ITEM.TITLE: Scythe of Vyse
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.

ITEM.TITLE: Refresher Orb
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

ITEM.TITLE: Crystalys
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

ITEM.TITLE: Armlet of Mordiggian
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second. You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.
ITEM.RECIPE: Helm of Iron Will,Gloves of Haste,Blades of Attack

ITEM.TITLE: Skull Basher
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Shadow Blade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14.0 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Battle Fury
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 250 AoE around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

ITEM.TITLE: Ethereal Blade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts your target into ethereal form, increasing incoming magic damage. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2.0x of your primary attribute + 75 as damage.
ITEM.EXTRA: BLAST ENEMY DURATION: 3,BLAST ALLY/SELF DURATION: 4,INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%

ITEM.TITLE: Radiance
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Toggles Burn Damage on or off.Passive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a 700 radius.

ITEM.TITLE: Monkey King Bar
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.

ITEM.TITLE: Daedelus
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

ITEM.TITLE: Butterfly
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 20% additional movement speed for 8.0 seconds.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

ITEM.TITLE: Divine Rapier
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
ITEM.ROLE: Drops on death. Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.

ITEM.TITLE: Abyssal Blade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Goes through Spell Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Hood of Defiance
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
ITEM.RECIPE: Ring of Health,Cloak,Ring of Regen,Ring of Regen

ITEM.TITLE: Blade Mail
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.

ITEM.TITLE: Vanguard
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Damage Block - Gives the wielder a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
ITEM.EXTRA: BLOCK CHANCE: 80%,BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 40,BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 20

ITEM.TITLE: Soul Booster
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Regain lost courage.

ITEM.TITLE: Black King Bar
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.

ITEM.TITLE: Shiva's Guard
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
ITEM.EXTRA: AURA ATTACK SLOW: 40,BLAST DAMAGE: 200, BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%,BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4

ITEM.TITLE: Manta Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds.Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
ITEM.EXTRA: NUMBER OF IMAGES: 2,IMAGE DURATION: 20,MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE: 33%,MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 350%,RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE: 28%,RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%

ITEM.TITLE: BloodStone
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Pocket Suicide - Instantly commits suicide.Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 8 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 500 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.

ITEM.TITLE: Linken's Sphere
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
ITEM.ROLE: Spellblock - Passively blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds. Can be cast on an allied unit to temporarily transfer the buff.

ITEM.TITLE: Assault Cuirass
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
ITEM.EXTRA: AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20,AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5,AURA ARMOR REDUCTION: 5

ITEM.TITLE: Heart of Tarrasque
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second.This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.

ITEM.TITLE: Crimson Guard
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 50 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 9 seconds.Passive: Damage Block - Gives the wearer a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
ITEM.EXTRA: BLOCK CHANCE: 80%,BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 40,BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 20,GUARD ARMOR: 2,GUARD DURATION: 9,GUARD RADIUS: 750,GUARD DAMAGE BLOCK : 50

ITEM.TITLE: Helm of the Dominator
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit. Dominated units gain 250 bonus health.Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

ITEM.TITLE: Mask of Madness
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage. Lasts 12 seconds.Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks.Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

ITEM.TITLE: Sange
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
ITEM.EXTRA: MAIM CHANCE: 15%,AIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%,MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20

ITEM.TITLE: Yasha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
ITEM.ROLE: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

ITEM.TITLE: Maelstrom
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage.Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

ITEM.TITLE: Diffusal Blade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 25 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
ITEM.RECIPE: Recipe,Blade of Alacrity,Blade of Alacrity,Robe of the Magi

ITEM.TITLE: Desolator
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

ITEM.TITLE: Heaven's Halberd
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3.0 on Melee targets.Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
ITEM.EXTRA: MAIM CHANCE: 15%,MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%,MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20

ITEM.TITLE: Sange and Yasha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 5.0 seconds.Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
ITEM.EXTRA: MAIM CHANCE: 16%,MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 32%,MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 32

ITEM.TITLE: Mjollnir
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 8 targets, dealing damage.Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
ITEM.EXTRA: STATIC DURATION: 15,STATIC CHANCE: 20%,STATIC DAMAGE: 200,CHAIN CHANCE: 25%,CHAIN DAMAGE: 150

ITEM.TITLE: Eye of Skadi
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target.Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
ITEM.RECIPE: Ultimate Orb,Ultimate Orb,Point Booster,Orb of Venom

ITEM.TITLE: Satanic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
ITEM.ROLE: Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by 175% for 3.5 seconds.Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks.Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

ITEM.TITLE: Demon Edge
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

ITEM.TITLE: EagleSong
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

ITEM.TITLE: Reaver
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

ITEM.TITLE: Sacred Relic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

ITEM.TITLE: HyperStone
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

ITEM.TITLE: Ring of Health
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

ITEM.TITLE: Void Stone
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

ITEM.TITLE: Mystic Staff
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

ITEM.TITLE: Energy Booster
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

ITEM.TITLE: Point Booster
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

ITEM.TITLE: Vitality Booster
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

ITEM.TITLE: Orb of Venom
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Orb of Venom can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

ITEM.TITLE: Aegis of the Immortal
ITEM.ROLE: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
